mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO pl_mortgage_house_info( id, apply_no, property_right, property_name, current_use_status, house_use_property, land_use_property, house_type, cont_province, cont_city, cont_distinct, cont_details, building_area, using_area, floor_num, house_years, service_life, house_purchase_price, is_keep_papers, is_property_line, is_shift_record, property_status, is_unique_house, evaluate_way, market_price, evaluate_price, mortgagee_id, mortgagee_name, mortgagee_id_num, del_flag, mortgage_rate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, house_card_number, land_card_number, land_property, is_push_data ) VALUES
( #{mortgageHouseInfoList.id}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.applyNo}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.propertyRight}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.propertyName}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.currentUseStatus}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.houseUseProperty}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.landUseProperty}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.houseType}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.contProvince}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.contCity}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.contDistinct}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.contDetails}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.buildingArea}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.usingArea}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.floorNum}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.houseYears}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.serviceLife}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.housePurchasePrice}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.isKeepPapers}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.isPropertyLine}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.isShiftRecord}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.propertyStatus}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.isUniqueHouse}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.evaluateWay}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.marketPrice}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.evaluatePrice}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.mortgageeId}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.mortgageeName}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.mortgageeIdNum}, '0', #{mortgageHouseInfoList.mortgageRate}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.createBy.id}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.createDate}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.updateBy.id}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.updateDate}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.houseCardNumber}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.landCardNumber}, #{mortgageHouseInfoList.landProperty}, '0' )
